mapper.select: select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_content ,webtoon_info.webtoon_image from webtoon_info where webtoon_info.webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum}

select PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_num,PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME,kor_platform.kor,PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_link from PLATFORM_TABLE,KOR_PLATFORM where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME = kor_platform.eng order by WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME

select origin_table.webtoon_num, origin_table.origin_platform_name, KOR_PLATFORM.kor,origin_table.ORIGIN_WEBTOON_LINK from origin_table,KOR_PLATFORM where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and origin_table.origin_platform_name = KOR_PLATFORM.eng order by origin_platform_name
select * from favorites_info where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}

mapper.update: update favorites_info set interest = #{interest} where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
update favorites_info set FAVORITES = #{favorites} where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.select: select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image, PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME from PLATFORM_TABLE,webtoon_info where PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME = #{platformName} and PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_num = webtoon_info.webtoon_num

select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title,webtoon_info.webtoon_writer,webtoon_info.webtoon_image,GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_genre from GENRE_TABLE,webtoon_info where GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_num=webtoon_info.webtoon_num and GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_genre=#{webtoonGenre}

select DISTINCT webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image,PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME from user_info,webtoon_info, FAVORITES_INFO,PLATFORM_TABLE where user_info.user_email = #{userEmail} and FAVORITES_INFO.favorites = 'T' and user_info.user_email=FAVORITES_INFO.user_email and FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num=webtoon_info.webtoon_num and webtoon_info.webtoon_num =PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM and FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num = PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM order by webtoon_info.webtoon_title

select DISTINCT webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image,PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME from user_info,webtoon_info, FAVORITES_INFO,PLATFORM_TABLE where user_info.user_email = #{userEmail} and FAVORITES_INFO.INTEREST = 'T' and user_info.user_email=FAVORITES_INFO.user_email and FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num=webtoon_info.webtoon_num and webtoon_info.webtoon_num =PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM and FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num = PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM order by webtoon_info.webtoon_title

select DISTINCT webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image,( select count(favorites) from FAVORITES_INFO where FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num =PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM and FAVORITES_INFO.favorites = 'T')as count from webtoon_info, FAVORITES_INFO,PLATFORM_TABLE where webtoon_info.webtoon_num =PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM order by count desc, webtoon_info.webtoon_title asc
